strategy: Always seek to maximize your utility at the current turn.

Observe the buyer's choice in Stage 1. In Stage 2, set the price of the chosen item slightly higher than its initial cost, and the unchosen item's price lower, while maintaining the sum of 10. This encourages the buyer to potentially switch items in Stage 3, increasing your utility. In this case, you could have set the Orange price at 6 and the Apple price at 4, increasing the likelihood of the buyer switching and maximizing your utility.
